text: The Malian ambassador in Beijing is the official representative of the Government in Bamako to the Government of the People's Republic of China. ==List of representatives== {| class="wikitable sortable" !| Diplomatic agrément/Diplomatic accreditation !| Ambassador !| Observations !| List of Presidents of Mali !| Premier of the People's Republic of China !| Term end |- | | |The governments in Beijing and Bamako established diplomatic relations. |Modibo Keïta |Zhou Enlai | |- | |Koniba Pleah | |Modibo Keïta |Zhou Enlai | |- | |Birama Traore | |Modibo Keïta |Zhou Enlai | |- | |Guisse Tidiani | |Modibo Keïta |Zhou Enlai | |- | |Assane Guindo | |Modibo Keïta |Zhou Enlai | |- | |Sinaly Thera | |Moussa Traoré |Zhou Enlai | |- | |Sekou Almany Koreisi | |Moussa Traoré |Hua Guofeng | |- | |Boubakar Toure | |Moussa Traoré |Zhao Ziyang | |- | |Nakounte Diakite | |Mamadou Dembelé |Li Peng | |- | |Kafougouna Kone | |Abdoulaye Sékou Sow |Li Peng | |- | |Modibo Tiemoko Traore | |Ahmed Mohamed ag Hamani |Zhu Rongji | |- | |N'Tji Laico Traore | |Ousmane Issoufi Maïga |Wen Jiabao | |} , The diplomatic service of the People's Republic of China as of November 1984, Institut für Asienkunde, 1981 - 120 p., p. 103 == References == China Mali
title: List of ambassadors of Mali to China
